text:
libgit2 takes 10+ minutes to clone the local bare llvm repository, command line git:
```$ time git clone --bare llvm-project.git llvm-project-clone
Cloning into bare repository 'llvm-project-clone'...
done.

real    0m0.015s
user    0m0.001s
sys     0m0.014s```

elements.text: libgit2 takes 10+ minutes to clone the local bare llvm repository, command line git:

$ time git clone --bare llvm-project.git llvm-project-clone
Cloning into bare repository 'llvm-project-clone'...
done.

real    0m0.015s
user    0m0.001s
sys     0m0.014s

text: something is wrong here; `llvm-project.git` is hundreds of MBs, there’s no way you’re doing that in 10ms

elements.text: is hundreds of MBs, there’s no way you’re doing that in 10ms

text: I already deleted it :sweat_smile:   that was on kholin
I tried with the non-bare repo before, it was 4 seconds

elements.text: I tried with the non-bare repo before, it was 4 seconds

text:
```$ time git clone --bare <https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project.git>
Cloning into bare repository 'llvm-project.git'...
remote: Enumerating objects: 488, done.
remote: Counting objects: 100% (488/488), done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (77/77), done.
remote: Total 4259482 (delta 422), reused 418 (delta 411), pack-reused 4258994
Receiving objects: 100% (4259482/4259482), 1.34 GiB | 24.61 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (3390727/3390727), done.

real    2m4.088s
user    3m40.772s
sys     0m11.798s
$ du -hsc llvm-project.git/
1.5G    llvm-project.git/
1.5G    total
$ time git clone --bare llvm-project.git llvm-project-clone
Cloning into bare repository 'llvm-project-clone'...
done.

real    0m0.015s
user    0m0.005s
sys     0m0.010s
mose@kholin:~/repo$ du -hsc llvm-project-clone/
1.5G    llvm-project-clone/
1.5G    total```
